languages.text: Пока Космические волки отвлекают Уралона Жестокого, Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти путь к буровой платформе, чтобы вступить в битву с главарем еретиков.
While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.
languages.original_text: Пока Космические волки отвлекают Уралона Жестокого, Вольному Торговцу необходимо найти путь к буровой платформе, чтобы вступить в битву с главарем еретиков.

traits.locale_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

languages.text: Pendant que les Space Wolves détournent l'attention d'Uralon le Cruel, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit trouver le moyen d'atteindre la plateforme de forage pour faire face au chef des hérétiques.
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Pendant que les Space Wolves détournent l'attention d'Uralon le Cruel, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} doit trouver le moyen d'atteindre la plateforme de forage pour faire face au chef des hérétiques.

languages.text: 太空野狼在不断干扰残暴者乌拉隆的注意力，而行商浪人需要找到前往钻井平台的道路，与异端分子的领袖正面对峙。
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: 太空野狼在不断干扰残暴者乌拉隆的注意力，而行商浪人需要找到前往钻井平台的道路，与异端分子的领袖正面对峙。

languages.text: スペースウルフが残酷なウラロンの気を引いている間に、自由開拓者は掘削足場につながる道を探し出し、異端者のリーダーと対決しなければならない。
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: スペースウルフが残酷なウラロンの気を引いている間に、自由開拓者は掘削足場につながる道を探し出し、異端者のリーダーと対決しなければならない。

languages.text: Während die Space Wolves Uralon den Grausamen ablenken, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Weg finden, die Bohrplattform zu erreichen und den Anführer der Ketzer zu stellen.
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Während die Space Wolves Uralon den Grausamen ablenken, muss {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Weg finden, die Bohrplattform zu erreichen und den Anführer der Ketzer zu stellen.

languages.text: Mientras los Lobos Espaciales distraen a Uralon el Cruel, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe encontrar la forma de llegar a la plataforma perforadora y enfrentarse al líder de los herejes.
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.

traits.locale_text: Mientras los Lobos Espaciales distraen a Uralon el Cruel, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente debe encontrar la forma de llegar a la plataforma perforadora y enfrentarse al líder de los herejes.

languages.text: Uzay Kurtları'nın Zalim Uralon'u oyaladığı esnada Hür Tacir, delme platformuna erişmenin bir yolunu bulup kâfirlerin lideriyle yüzleşmeli.
languages.original_text: While the Space Wolves are distracting Uralon the Cruel, the Rogue Trader must find a way to reach the drilling platform and confront the leader of the heretics.
